description: Purposeful Strengthening and Expanding of Qualified Services on Tuberculosis Diagnostics and Treatment in Turkmenistan

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
The project supports consolidation of the Directly Observed Treatment, short-course (DOTS) framework through strengthening programme management, improving TB case detection and diagnosis and ensuring quality treatment.
Also, it contributes to improving the health system performance for effective tuberculosis control. Ensures introduction of and expands access to diagnosis and treatment of drug-resistant tuberculosis.
subproject.title: Diagnostics & Treatment of TB
